reviews.text: Note: We were here for restaurant week, and sat at the bar.  None of the food we ordered is currently on the regular menu. But I feel like this review...

This restaurant was delightful. The staff was very knowledgeable and kind. 

It's hard to find a nice place that offers vegetarian options other than salad,...
